---

_The Demon's Lantern_ represents trickery and feats of legerdemain. As long as you have _The Demon's Lantern_ invested, you gain a +2 item bonus to checks made to [Conceal an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=61), [Palm an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=67), or [Steal](/Actions.aspx?ID=68). This increases to a +3 item bonus if you are at least 17th level.
